Interface InboxPage

    public interface InboxPage
    Provides helper methods to perform actions on the inbox page

                                    java.lang.String comment)
        Advanced a workflow through the inbox using the title of the page
        Parameters:
        pageTitle - The title of the page shown in the inbox
        comment - The comment to input when advancing
        Returns:
        A new instance of InboxPage after JS has run updates
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
